languages.text: "Да. Технобрат Авель прибыл для магнитной медитации, которая могла бы прояснить его видения. К сожалению, козни еретиков не дали нам завершить ритуал. Почтенный логис вызвался помочь нам в обороне монастыря, но вскоре связь с ним была прервана".

"Yes. Tech-Brother Abel arrived here to engage in a magnetic meditation that would help clarify his visions. Unfortunately, the heretics' machinations prevented us from completing the ritual. The esteemed Logis volunteered his help in defending the monastery, but contact with him was lost soon afterward."
languages.original_text: "Да. Технобрат Авель прибыл для магнитной медитации, которая могла бы прояснить его видения. К сожалению, козни еретиков не дали нам завершить ритуал. Почтенный логис вызвался помочь нам в обороне монастыря, но вскоре связь с ним была прервана".

Unfortunately, the heretics' machinations prevented us from completing the ritual. The esteemed logis volunteered his help in defending the monastery, but contact with him was lost soon afterwards."

languages.text: "Ja. Tech-Bruder Abel ist hier eingetroffen, um seine Vision durch eine magnetische Meditation zu deuten. Unglücklicherweise konnten wir das Ritual wegen der Intrigen der Ketzer nicht abschließen. Der hochverehrte Logis hat seine Hilfe bei der Verteidigung des Klosters angeboten, doch bald darauf ging der Kontakt zu ihm verloren."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Tech-Brother Abel arrived here to engage in a magnetic meditation that would help clarify his visions. Unfortunately, the heretics' machinations prevented us from completing the ritual. The esteemed Logis volunteered his help in defending the monastery, but contact with him was lost soon afterward."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Tech-Bruder Abel ist hier eingetroffen, um seine Vision durch eine magnetische Meditation zu deuten. Unglücklicherweise konnten wir das Ritual wegen der Intrigen der Ketzer nicht abschließen. Der hochverehrte Logis hat seine Hilfe bei der Verteidigung des Klosters angeboten, doch bald darauf ging der Kontakt zu ihm verloren."

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Le technofrère Abel est venu ici pour effectuer une méditation magnétique afin de mieux comprendre ses visions. Malheureusement, les machinations des hérétiques nous ont empêchés d'achever le rituel... L'honorable logis s'est porté volontaire pour défendre le monastère, mais nous avons rapidement perdu tout contact avec lui. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. Tech-Brother Abel arrived here to engage in a magnetic meditation that would help clarify his visions. Unfortunately, the heretics' machinations prevented us from completing the ritual. The esteemed Logis volunteered his help in defending the monastery, but contact with him was lost soon afterward."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Le technofrère Abel est venu ici pour effectuer une méditation magnétique afin de mieux comprendre ses visions. Malheureusement, les machinations des hérétiques nous ont empêchés d'achever le rituel... L'honorable logis s'est porté volontaire pour défendre le monastère, mais nous avons rapidement perdu tout contact avec lui. »

languages.text: “是的，技术兄弟亚伯来这里进行磁性冥想，帮助他理清幻象。遗憾的是，异端分子的阴谋扰乱了这场仪式。尊敬的逻辑士自愿帮助我们保卫修道院，但我们不久之后就与他失去了联系。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. Tech-Brother Abel arrived here to engage in a magnetic meditation that would help clarify his visions. Unfortunately, the heretics' machinations prevented us from completing the ritual. The esteemed Logis volunteered his help in defending the monastery, but contact with him was lost soon afterward."

traits.locale_text: “是的，技术兄弟亚伯来这里进行磁性冥想，帮助他理清幻象。遗憾的是，异端分子的阴谋扰乱了这场仪式。尊敬的逻辑士自愿帮助我们保卫修道院，但我们不久之后就与他失去了联系。”

languages.text: 「そうだ。技術同志アベルがここに来たのは、彼のビジョンを明確にするための磁気瞑想に取り組むためだった。残念なことに、異端者たちの策略によって儀式を完了することができなかった。敬愛すべき論理学者は、修道院の守護に志願してくれたが、その後すぐに通信が途絶えてしまった」
languages.original_text: "Yes. Tech-Brother Abel arrived here to engage in a magnetic meditation that would help clarify his visions. Unfortunately, the heretics' machinations prevented us from completing the ritual. The esteemed Logis volunteered his help in defending the monastery, but contact with him was lost soon afterward."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。テックブラザー・アベルがここに来たのは、彼のビジョンを明確にするための磁気瞑想に取り組むためだった。残念なことに、異端者たちの策略によって儀式を完了することができなかった。敬愛すべき論理学者は、修道院の守護に志願してくれたが、その後すぐに通信が途絶えてしまった」

languages.text: «Sí. El tecnohermano Abel llegó aquí para realizar una meditación magnética que le ayudara a aclarar sus visiones. Por desgracia, los planes de los herejes nos impidieron completar el ritual. El estimado Logos se ofreció voluntario para defender el monasterio, pero poco después se perdió el contacto».
languages.original_text: "Yes. Tech-Brother Abel arrived here to engage in a magnetic meditation that would help clarify his visions. Unfortunately, the heretics' machinations prevented us from completing the ritual. The esteemed Logis volunteered his help in defending the monastery, but contact with him was lost soon afterward."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. El tecnohermano Abel llegó aquí para realizar una meditación magnética que le ayudara a aclarar sus visiones. Por desgracia, los planes de los herejes nos impidieron completar el ritual. El estimado Logos se ofreció voluntario para defender el monasterio, pero poco después se perdió el contacto».

languages.text: "Evet. Tekno Kardeş Abel, görülerinin netleşmesine yardımcı olacak bir manyetik meditasyon gerçekleştirmek üzere buraya geldi. Maalesef kâfirlerin hain tertipleri, ayinini tamamlamasını engelledi. Saygıdeğer Logis, manastırın savunmasında yer almak için gönüllü oldu ancak kısa süre sonra kendisiyle irtibat kesildi."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Tech-Brother Abel arrived here to engage in a magnetic meditation that would help clarify his visions. Unfortunately, the heretics' machinations prevented us from completing the ritual. The esteemed Logis volunteered his help in defending the monastery, but contact with him was lost soon afterward."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Tekno Kardeş Abel, görülerini netleştirmesine yardımcı olacak bir manyetik meditasyon gerçekleştirmek üzere buraya geldi. Maalesef kâfirlerin hileleri, ayinini tamamlamasını engelledi. Saygıdeğer Logis, manastırın savunmasında yer almak için gönüllü oldu ancak kısa süre içinde kendisiyle irtibat kesildi."
